nodes.text: Simon Kinberg is an English-born American screenwriter and producer who serves as creator, writer, and executive producer for the television series Star Wars Rebels. Kinberg was also writing the script for an untitled Star Wars film.
Kinberg recommended Josh Trank as director of his project to Lucasfilm after collaborating with him on the Fantastic Four reboot. However, Trank left the project after a year of development.
